reviews.noReviewsDetail: When you review a stadium, it will appear here. Start exploring and reviewing stadiums!
reviews.peopleWaiting: People are waiting for your review

gameHistory.noGameHistoryDetail: You haven't played any games yet. Start exploring our stadiums and book your favorite slot now!

aboutScreen.description: MatchMate is your ultimate companion for finding and joining sports activities in your area. Whether you're into basketball, football, or volleyball, MatchMate connects you with local games and teams. Book stadium time slots, generate QR codes for entry, and track your sports activities all in one place.

features.joinTeams: • Join Teams and Play Sports: Find and join teams to play basketball, football, volleyball, and more with people in your locality.
features.bookSlots: • Book Stadium Time Slots: Easily book available time slots at local stadiums directly through the app.
features.generateQR: • Generate QR Codes: Get a QR code for your bookings to streamline your stadium entry process.
features.profileManagement: • Profile Management: View and manage your profile, including your personal details and sports preferences.
features.gameHistory: • Game History: Keep track of all the games you've played, with detailed history and stats.
features.userReviews: • User Reviews: Read and write reviews for players and games, helping to build a trusted community.
features.leaderboard: • Leaderboard: See who the most active players are with our leaderboard, showcasing the top players based on games played.

aboutScreen.contactUs: For support, feedback, or inquiries, please contact us at:

bookingScreen.noBookingsMessage: You haven't made any bookings yet or the time has expired. Start exploring our stadiums and book your favorite slot now!
